body: @jeffallen, commit 467a2cb was a change to register allocation in the arm64 compiler. But you are reporting a problem on OS X 10.10.5, which does not run on arm64. So perhaps you meant a different commit? I would be interested to know when it started if you can git bisect it (perhaps the bug is in 10.10.5 and any version fails, but that would be good to know too). Thanks.
